description:
The classic Prince of Persia is now available for download! Relive this classic platforming experience, often heralded as a pioneer of the platforming genre. This rerelease is faithful to the original, complete with the dashing acrobatics of the Prince that made the game famous.

Traverse sprawling levels, dodge deadly traps like spikes and guillotines, and clash swords with palace guards--all before facing the evil Grand Vizier and rescuing the princess. But be quick: you only have one hour! The sands of time are flowing…
name: Prince of Persia®
disclaimer: You may need an additional compatible SD card or SDHC card with available space to download this software. Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
